Condition_summary_1: measures and standards to avoid and mitigate serious harm to fish shall be implemented before, during, and following in-water work
Condition_summary_2: monitoring and reporting of implementation of offsetting measures with post-construction monitoring for three years
Condition_summary_3: offsetting measures (3,462 m2) to be completed upstream and downstream on the west bank according to the approved plan
Condition_summary_4: contingency measures must be reviewed and approved by DFO if mitigation measures fail or offsetting measures are not effective
Fish_species: None explicitly listed in the document
Vegetation_Cover: None explicitly mentioned in the offsetting measures
Instream_structures: None explicitly mentioned in the offsetting measures
